body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Star Hotels customer support. My name is Aaron Miller. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Nicole Harris.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Nicole. Can you please provide me with your room number and the date of your stay?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my room number is two five zero eight and I checked in on the twenty-second of March.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Nicole. One last thing, can you confirm the last four digits of the credit card used for booking your reservation and your email address for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, the last four digits of my credit card are seven eight nine zero, and my email address is nicole.harris@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing the information, Nicole. We will look into the issue with the room service. Is there anything else you would like to add or ask?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all. I appreciate your assistance.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Nicole. If you have any more concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out. Thank you for your time and have a great day.
